display_long_description:
PROJECT E: HIGH VOLTAGE RACING 
Step into the virtual cockpit of a high-performance electric single-seater and feel the rush of a realistic VR racing simulator. Project E is a unique, immersive VR experience that simulates driving an electric single-seater and managing consumption strategies. Project E uses a sporting metaphor to represent the challenges of our times, where the goal is to achieve the best performance in a sustainable way, despite limited resources.

The Project E features:

INTERACT WITH THE VIRTUAL COCKPIT: 
Experience the realism of the controls on the virtual steering wheel.

BEAT THE BOT:
"Overtake the AI bot cars one by one from level one to level thirty and become the ultimate champion!

IMPROVE YOUR LAP TIME:
Keep challenging the ghost cars of your recorded best laps!

INTERACT WITH THE VIRTUAL COCKPIT: 
Experience the realism of the controls on the virtual steering wheel.

STRATEGIZE THE POWER CONSUMPTION.
Maximise your energy efficiency by strategically managing your vehicle's power mode and regenerative braking settings.

ENHANCE YOUR GAMING EXPERIENCE:
For tips and customization options, follow the guide link: https://sandboxgames.it/PE_guide.pdf
